articles.title: Attention! Even A 20-year-old Not Safe From Hypertension, Says WHO - Times Now
articles.description: A recently released report by the World Health Organisation has flagged India’s increasing hypertension cases, with only 37 per cent diagnosed and 30 per cent getting treated for the deadly condition, which can cause a heart attack, stroke, or heart failure. …
